message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a great price of $150.  It's a fantastic deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $130. It's a steal at that price!
Alice, I appreciate your stance on the product's value, but I still believe we can come to an agreement at $110. Thank you for considering my previous offer.
